original: 曹操知道了界橋被我方攻下後十分憤怒，據報正在召集兵馬，準備搶回界橋。請大哥立刻派出探子，前往濮陽一探虛實。
text: Cao Cao was very angry when he learned that the Jieqiao was captured by our side. It was reported that he was summoning troops and horses to take the Jieqiao back. Please send out spies immediately to Puyang to investigate the reality.
